topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54caa72e6368720b1e4c0600#post_54caa72e6368720b1e4c0600
Dude, that Stands are so cool!
ESPECIALLY in Part 4 where they get weirder.
Like my favorite Stand in Part 4 is Crazy Diamond. It can return things to their original state. So lets say you tear a piece of cloth from someone's clothes who is running away. You use Crazy Diamond and the piece of cloth starts flying in the direction of of it's source. Effectively becoming a tracking device. There was also this cool scene involving destroying and fixing a motorcycle in like two pages. Part 4 is amazing..
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54caa84063687269a3cd0900#post_54caa84063687269a3cd0900
